languages.text: "Боюсь, я не могу принять доклад от другого человека". {n}Сухие пальцы ловко извлекают из кипы бумаг исписанный мелкими буквами пергамент:{/n} "Согласно статуту Простора Коронус 19/А-11: о любом решении по десятине, ответ держит только то лицо, что непосредственно выносило оное решение. В противном случае отчет не имеет законной силы". {n}Префект убирает листок на прежнее место.{/n} "Как видите, во имя священного регламента вы должны подать доклад лично, как и я обязана принять его лишь у вас".

"I am afraid I cannot accept another person's report." {n}Her shrivelled fingers nimbly extract a piece of parchment from her stack of papers. It is covered in minuscule writing.{/n} "According to Koronus Expanse Statute 19/A-11, any decision pertaining to matters of the tithe shall solely be answered for by the person that directly made said decision. A report made by any other person shall be deemed legally null and void." {n}The prefect puts the document back in its place.{/n} "As you can see, there is a sacred stipulation that you submit your report in person and that I accept it from no one else."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, я не могу принять доклад от другого человека". {n}Сухие пальцы ловко извлекают из кипы бумаг исписанный мелкими буквами пергамент:{/n} "Согласно статуту Простора Коронус 19/А-11: о любом решении по десятине, ответ держит только то лицо, что непосредственно выносило оное решение. В противном случае отчет не имеет законной силы". {n}Префект убирает листок на прежнее место.{/n} "Как видите, во имя священного регламента вы должны подать доклад лично, как и я обязана принять его лишь у вас".

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, ich kann den Bericht einer anderen Person nicht akzeptieren." {n}Ihre verschrumpelten Finger entnehmen ihrem Papierstapel geschickt ein Stück Pergament. Es ist mit winzigen Schriftzeichen bedeckt.{/n} "Gemäß Statut 19/A-11 der Koronus-Ausdehnung müssen alle Entscheidungen bezüglich des Zehnts ausschließlich mit der Person besprochen werden, die besagte Entscheidung getroffen hat. Jeder Bericht einer anderen Person gilt rechtlich als null und nichtig." {n}Die Präfektin legt das Dokument an seinen Platz zurück.{/n} "Wie Ihr seht, liegt eine heilige Vorschrift vor, laut der Ihr Euren Bereich eigenhändig einreichen müsst, weil ich ihn von niemand anderem annehmen darf."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot accept another person's report." {n}Her shrivelled fingers nimbly extract a piece of parchment from her stack of papers. It is covered in minuscule writing.{/n} "According to Koronus Expanse Statute 19/A-11, any decision pertaining to matters of the tithe shall solely be answered for by the person that directly made said decision. A report made by any other person shall be deemed legally null and void." {n}The prefect puts the document back in its place.{/n} "As you can see, there is a sacred stipulation that you submit your report in person and that I accept it from no one else."

Es ist mit winzigen Schriftzeichen bedeckt.{/n} "Gemäß Statut 19/A-11 der Koronus-Ausdehnung müssen alle Entscheidungen bezüglich des Zehnts ausschließlich mit der Person besprochen werden, die besagte Entscheidung getroffen hat. Jeder Bericht einer anderen Person gilt rechtlich als null und nichtig." {n}Die Präfektin legt das Dokument an seinen Platz zurück.{/n} "Wie Ihr seht, liegt eine heilige Vorschrift vor, laut der Ihr Euren Bereich eigenhändig einreichen müsst, weil ich ihn von niemand anderem annehmen darf."

languages.text: « J'ai bien peur de ne pouvoir accepter le rapport d'une tierce personne. » {n}De ses doigts fripés, elle extrait agilement un parchemin de sa pile de documents. Il est couvert de minuscules pattes de mouche.{/n} « Conformément à la loi 19/A-11 des Étendues de Koronus, toute décision relative à la collecte de la dîme devra être motivée par l'individu qui l'a prise en personne. Tout rapport présenté par un tiers sera considéré comme juridiquement nul et non avenu. » {n}La préfète remet le document à sa place.{/n} « Comme vous pouvez le constater, la législation sacrée exige que vous soumettiez votre rapport en personne et m'interdit de l'accepter venant de qui que ce soit d'autre. »
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot accept another person's report." {n}Her shrivelled fingers nimbly extract a piece of parchment from her stack of papers. It is covered in minuscule writing.{/n} "According to Koronus Expanse Statute 19/A-11, any decision pertaining to matters of the tithe shall solely be answered for by the person that directly made said decision. A report made by any other person shall be deemed legally null and void." {n}The prefect puts the document back in its place.{/n} "As you can see, there is a sacred stipulation that you submit your report in person and that I accept it from no one else."

Tout rapport présenté par un tiers sera considéré comme juridiquement nul et non avenu. » {n}La préfète remet le document à sa place.{/n} « Comme vous pouvez le constater, la législation sacrée veut que vous soumettiez votre rapport en personne et m'interdit de l'accepter venant de qui que ce soit d'autre. »

languages.text: “恐怕我无法接受其他人的报告。”{n}她干瘪的手指灵活地从一叠文件中抽出一张羊皮纸，纸上写满了极其细小的字迹。{/n}“根据科罗努斯扩区19/A-11号章程规定，一切与神圣什一税相关的事项，只能由直接做出决定的人负责。其他人的报告在法律意义上视为无效。”{n}随后，行政官将这份报告放回了原处。{/n}“如您所见，这件事情有着神圣规定。您必须亲自提交您的报告，我无权接受其他人的报告。”
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot accept another person's report." {n}Her shrivelled fingers nimbly extract a piece of parchment from her stack of papers. It is covered in minuscule writing.{/n} "According to Koronus Expanse Statute 19/A-11, any decision pertaining to matters of the tithe shall solely be answered for by the person that directly made said decision. A report made by any other person shall be deemed legally null and void." {n}The prefect puts the document back in its place.{/n} "As you can see, there is a sacred stipulation that you submit your report in person and that I accept it from no one else."

languages.text: «Me temo que no puedo aceptar el informe de otra persona». {n}Sus dedos arrugados extraen con destreza un pergamino de su montón. Está cubierto de palabras diminutas.{/n} «Según el estatuto 19/A-11 de la Extensión de Koronus: Toda decisión relativa al diezmo debe ser asumida únicamente por la persona que ha tomado directamente dicha decisión. Los informes de otras partes serán nulos a efectos legales». {n}La prefecta devuelve el documento a su lugar.{/n} «Como ve, la estipulación sagrada exige que realice su informe personalmente y que yo solo lo acepte si es suyo».
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot accept another person's report." {n}Her shrivelled fingers nimbly extract a piece of parchment from her stack of papers. It is covered in minuscule writing.{/n} "According to Koronus Expanse Statute 19/A-11, any decision pertaining to matters of the tithe shall solely be answered for by the person that directly made said decision. A report made by any other person shall be deemed legally null and void." {n}The prefect puts the document back in its place.{/n} "As you can see, there is a sacred stipulation that you submit your report in person and that I accept it from no one else."

languages.text: 「申し訳ありませんが、第三者による報告は受け取れません」{n}しわくちゃの指が素早く書類の山から羊皮紙の一枚を取り出す。それは細かい文字で埋め尽くされていた。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスの規則19/A-11：租税に関する決定については、直接その決定を下した者のみが責任を負うものとする。第三者による報告は法的に無効とみなされる」{n}総監は書類を元の場所に戻した。{/n}「ご覧の通り、報告は本人が直接提出し、私も第三者から受け取らないという厳格な規定があります」
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot accept another person's report." {n}Her shrivelled fingers nimbly extract a piece of parchment from her stack of papers. It is covered in minuscule writing.{/n} "According to Koronus Expanse Statute 19/A-11, any decision pertaining to matters of the tithe shall solely be answered for by the person that directly made said decision. A report made by any other person shall be deemed legally null and void." {n}The prefect puts the document back in its place.{/n} "As you can see, there is a sacred stipulation that you submit your report in person and that I accept it from no one else."

「申し訳ありませんが、第三者による報告は受け取れません」{n}しわくちゃの指が素早く書類の山から羊皮紙の一枚を取り出す。それは細かい文字で埋め尽くされていた。{/n}「規則19/A-11：租税に関する決定については、直接その決定を下した者のみが責任を負うものとする。第三者による報告は法的に無効とみなされる」{n}総監は書類を元の場所に戻した。{/n}「ご覧の通り、報告は本人が直接提出し、私も第三者から受け取らないという厳格な規定があります」

languages.text: "Korkarım ki bir başkasının raporunu kabul edemem." {n}Buruşmuş parmaklarıyla kâğıt yığınları içinden bir parça parşömen çıkarır. Parşömenin üzerinde minik harflerle yazılmış yazılar vardır.{/n} "Koronus Enginliği Yasası 19/A-11'e göre aşarlara ilişkin her türlü karar, söz konusu kararı doğrudan veren kişi tarafından tek başına olacak şekilde alınır. Bir başkası tarafından hazırlanmış raporlarsa yasal olarak hükümsüz sayılacaktır." {n}Prefekt, parşömeni yerine koyar.{/n} "Gördüğünüz üzere, raporunuzu şahsen sunmanız ve dahası, benim de bir başkasından rapor kabul etmemem hususunda kutsal bir hüküm var."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid I cannot accept another person's report." {n}Her shrivelled fingers nimbly extract a piece of parchment from her stack of papers. It is covered in minuscule writing.{/n} "According to Koronus Expanse Statute 19/A-11, any decision pertaining to matters of the tithe shall solely be answered for by the person that directly made said decision. A report made by any other person shall be deemed legally null and void." {n}The prefect puts the document back in its place.{/n} "As you can see, there is a sacred stipulation that you submit your report in person and that I accept it from no one else."

Bir başkası tarafından hazırlanmış raporlarsa yasal olarak hükümsüz sayılacaktır." {n}Prefekt, parşömeni yerine koyar.{/n} "Gördüğünüz üzere, raporunuzu şahsen sunmanız ve dahası, benim de bir başkasından rapor kabul etmemem hususunda kutsal bir hüküm var."
